column2: "Na David ne ba Solomon maa n’ahendzi no tsimii
column3: na EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn no dzii n’ekyir
apem apem na ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no
column5: na Israel nyinara mu ɔbapɔmba biara

column3: na mboanofo a wɔka no ho no nyinara sii mu kɔr bea sorɔnsorɔm no a ɔwɔ Gibeon no do; osiandɛ hɔ na Nyankopɔn n’ehyiadzibuw no a EWURADZE n’akowaa Moses yɛɛ no wɔ sar no do no wɔ."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn n’adakaa no dze David akɛfa no wɔ Kiriat-jearim aba bea a David esiesie ama no no do; osiandɛ oesi buw bi ama no wɔ Jerusalɛm."
"Nkyii so boran afɔrmbukyia no a Bezalel
column6: ɔwɔ EWURADZE ne ntamadan no enyim hɔ: na Solomon na mboanofo no hwehwɛɛ n’ekyir kwan."

column2: "Na Solomon fowee kɔr boran afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ EWURADZE enyim no a osi ehyiadzibuw no enyim no ho
column3: na ɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr apem wɔ do."

column2: "Anadwe no ara nna Nyankopɔn yii noho kyerɛɛ Solomon

column3: Ɔwo na ayɛ m’egya David ayamuyie kɛse
column4: na ahyɛ me ɔhen wɔ n’ananmu."
ma w’anohoba ntsim mma m’egya David: osiandɛ ɔwo ahyɛ me ɔhen wɔ ɔman a hɔn dodow tse dɛ asaase do huntuma do."

column3: ma muntum mfa mbu wo man yi: na woana na obotum ebu wo man yi a ɔyɛ kɛse dɛm yi atsɛn?"

column7: na eso hɔn a wɔtan wo hɔn nkwa
column8: nkyii so emmbisa nkwa tsentsen; na mbom ebisa nyansa na nyimdzee ama woho
column9: ma edze eebu me man a mahyɛ wo hɔn do hen no atsɛn ntsi yi:"

column2: "nyansa na nyimdzee medze ama wo; na mebɛma wo ahonya
column4: na enyidzi so a ahemfo a woedzi w’enyim no mu biara ennya no dɛm
column5: eso hɔn a wodzi w’ekyir no mu biara rinnya ne saso."

column2: "Nna Solomon fii n’akwantu a otui kɔr bea sorɔnsorɔm no a ɔwɔ Gibeon no
column3: fii ehyiadzibuw no enyim baa Jerusalɛm; na odzii hen wɔ Israel do."

column2: "Na Solomon boaboaa ntseaseanam na mpɔnkɔdofo ano: na onyaa ntseaseanam apem ahaanan
column4: na ɔdze hɔn sisii ntseaseanam nkurow no mu
column5: na ɔnye ɔhen no nkyɛn wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na ɔhen no maa dwetɛ na sika yɛɛ dɛ abo wɔ Jerusalɛm
column3: ɔmaa nkyindur ndua so yɛɛ dɛ ankye ndua bi a ɔwowɔ abɔn mu nkurow mu
wɔdze fi Egypt bae; ɔhen n’eguadzifo no kɛgyegyee hɔn ekuwekuw mu
column4: kuw kor wɔ no bo do."

column2: "Na wɔkɛfaa tseaseanam fi Egypt bae dze bɛgyee dwetɛ dwetɛbona ahaesia
column4: dze bɛgyee ɔha eduonum: na dɛmara so na wɔdze bi fiir edzi bɔtɔnee maa Hitifo ahemfo na Siria ahemfo no nyinara."
